ARABIC: وَيَٰقَوْمِ مَا لِىٓ أَدْعُوكُمْ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدْعُونَنِىٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My people! how is it that I call you to salvation while you call me to the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O my people, what is wrong with me that I am calling you to preservation, while you invite me to the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: My people, how is it that I call you to salvation while you call me to the Fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: My people, "How strange is it that I invite you to salvation when you invite me to the fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And O my people! What is the matter with me that I call you towards salvation whereas you call me towards hell?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And O my people! How is it that I call you to salvation while you call me to the Fire!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And, O my people! how is it that I call you to salvation and you call me to the fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O my people, how is it with me, that I call you to salvation, and you call me to the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And, O my people! What aileth me that I call you unto deliverance when ye call me unto the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My people! How is it that I call you to salvation, while you call me to the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And, O my people! what aileth me that call you Unto deliverance, while ye call me Unto the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O my people! [Think,] what makes me invite you to deliverance, while you invite me toward the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And O my people! How (strange) it is for me to call you to Salvation while ye call me to the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And O my people! How is it that I call you to salvation while you call me to the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My nation, how is it that I call you to salvation and you call me to the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O my people, how is it that I call you to salvation, and you call me to the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation while you invite me to the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:41] And O my people! [Think] what makes me call you to deliverance when you call me to the Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And, my people! What aileth me that I call you unto deliverance) unto Allah's divine Oneness-this is also the saying of Ezekiel-(when ye call me unto the Fire) while you are calling me to the deeds of the dwellers of the Fire: i.e. to idolatry?
